sentence.text: Multivariate analysis data revealed that nucleotide-excision repair and protein phosphorylation protein expression were independent predictors of overall survival of ESCC patients after chemotherapy and/or radiotherapy (P < .05).ERCC1 overexpression is an important phenotype that is associated with ESCC lymph node metastasis and advanced tumor clinical stages.
nucleotide-excision repair overexpression associated with advanced tumor clinical stage and lymph node metastasis (P < .05), but not with tumor size, depth of invasion, or differentiation (P > .05).
